title: Premiere: Jimny (Feat. Wadé) – Without You
body:
Brooklyn’s **Jimny** comes raring out of the blocks on his explosive debut single, _Without You_.

Calling in the vocal talents of UK newcomer Wadé, there’s an almost early 00’s garage vibe to the addictive energy that pulses throughout – all wrapped up in some of the smoothest production you’ll hear this year. With a host of remixes already under his belt, his debut original offering is a surefire signal of intent. Featured on Jimny’s forthcoming debut album out on Hoxton based label Perfect Havoc in 2017, it’s an early indication of special things to come from the young producer.

Without You is out now on [iTunes](https://exit.sc/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapple.co%2F2fhd2Ji), [Spotify](http://spoti.fi/2fKYUsc) and [Apple Music](http://bit.ly/2ev6cyu).

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
